name: Dubstep Cop
description:
We busted this out in less than 24 hours when we realized we had nothing to do while waiting for our flight home after GDC 2015. Wear headphones or use good speakers!

Controls

Hit space in time with the cop cars to get points!

Crew

  • Alfredofreak: music
  • Hysvear: art
  • Colonel Witty Hill: code
  • Everyone: design
